name: Tenders Fight
storyline:
Tenders Fight is a fast FPS Game in which you take on the role of a space boxer who must fight against the evil forces of chickens in order to return to earth. You can use your fists, feet and special abilities to defeat your enemies and escape the space ship.

The game features a wide variety of fighting styles and combos that you can unleash on your enemies. You can punch, kick, parry and dash. You can also use your movement skills to dodge attacks, cross spaces and reach new areas.

The game also has platforming elements in which you must traverse challenging levels filled with traps. You can use your dash ability to jump over obstacles, leap over walls and dodge enemy attacks.

Tenders Fight is a game that will test your skills and reflexes as you fight your way through space! If you're looking for a fun and exciting action game, then Tenders Fight is the game for you!
summary: Tenders Fight is a thrilling fighting game where you go up against a horde of aggressive chicken aliens. You play as a boxer, using your skills to defeat these cunning creatures. With each level, the chickens become stronger and smarter, testing your abilities to their limits. Can you defeat them?
